Generation IV.Diamond: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.
Generation IV.Pearl: Hanging from branches using its tentacles, it looks like a plant. It awaits prey, mouth wide open.
Generation IV.Platinum: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It walks around on its tentacles in search of a tree branch where it can dangle down and ambush prey.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It walks around on its tentacles in search of a tree branch where it can dangle down and ambush prey.

Generation V.Black: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.
Generation V.White: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.
Generation V.Black 2: Using its tentacles to lash itself to trees, it lies in wait for prey, luring it close with sweet-smelling drool.
Generation V.White 2: Using its tentacles to lash itself to trees, it lies in wait for prey, luring it close with sweet-smelling drool.

Generation VI.X: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.
Generation VI.Y: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat its prey.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Using its tentacles to hang from branches, it looks like a plant when it is not moving. It awaits prey with its mouth wide open.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Though this is a plant Pokémon, it has a gluttonous and unruly temperament. Carnivine attacks its prey with its cavernous maw wide open.

Generation IV.HeartGold: Safari Zone (Desert with 49 Plains points; tall grass in Marshland with 35 Forest points) Ilex Forest , Viridian Forest (Sinnoh Sound)
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Safari Zone (Desert with 49 Plains points; tall grass in Marshland with 35 Forest points) Ilex Forest , Viridian Forest (Sinnoh Sound)

Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Crimson Mirelands : Golden Lowlands and nearby, Gapejaw Bog , Holm of Trials , Cloudpool Ridge , Shrouded Ruins , near Diamond Settlement , near Cottonsedge Prairie (additional ), near Lake Valor , massive mass outbreaks Cobalt Coastlands : Space-time distortions Coronet Highlands : Lonely Spring (additional )
